pledge

the downroot pledge

Every downroot certified business must pledge to strive for net zero deforestation.The requirements of a downroot pledgee include (1) incorporating atleast one environmental awareness event annually and (2) contributing to reforestation by either donating 1% of overall profit or matching their deforestation expenses.

### pledges worldwide
